title: Five women, including bride wearing light colored, long sleeved, sweetheart laced neckline dress with long train, light colored gloves, two strand necklace, headpiece with large flowers and veil attached, holding bouquet of flowers, five men, including groom wearing solid colored jacket, light colored shirt and bow tie, two girls and boy, posed in interior standing in front of moire backdrop with light colored stripes on side, at Harris Studio
